title: Fresh Herb Yorkshire Pudding
ingredients: ['Yorkshire Pudding Batter', '275g (10 oz) plain flour (sifted)', '4 eggs', '1 pinch salt', '150ml water', '150ml milk', '2 large onions', '1 tbsp freshly chopped sage', '1 tbsp freshly chopped parsley', '1 tbsp freshly chopped mint (optional)', '2 tbsp fresh white breadcrumbs', 'fresh coarse ground black pepper', 'salt', 'sunflower oil']
